title: Former foreign minister Kuleba takes Ukraine's message to lecture halls
summary: Swept aside in a cabinet reshuffle, Dmytro Kuleba now teaches 'diplomacy in wartime' at Sciences Po university in Paris – and is free to speak his mind.

title: After decades on the sidelines of French politics, PM Bayrou grapples with being in charge
summary: For 30 years François Bayrou was a man of analysis and commentary. On Tuesday, he will make his government policy statement to Parliament, in which he will lay out his priorities as prime minister.

summary: Between relief and apprehension, Lebanon is concerned about local repercussions of the change of leadership in Syria. Joseph Aoun's election as Lebanese president could open up new dialogue between the two countries.

title: Macron's top diplomatic adviser tenders resignation
summary: Emmanuel Bonne announced his departure amid tensions with the Elysée Palace's military staff.

title: Los Angeles fires death toll rises to at least 24 as officials warn of more dangerous winds
